entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
